00035               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(iser::ISerializable);

00037               I_ASSIGN(m_dimensionsCountAttrPtr, "ValuesCount", "Default number of numeric values (will be used if no constraints set)", true, 1);

00041               I_ASSIGN(m_constraintsCompPtr, "Constraints", "Constraints object describing possible parameter values", false, "Constraints");
